name: cssobj-core
description: Generate Virtual CSS middle format, support for all cssobj functions and plugins.

scripts.report: cd dist && gzip < cssobj-core.min.js > cssobj-core.min.gz && ls -lh && rm -f *.gz
scripts.make: rollup -c && uglifyjs dist/cssobj-core.iife.js -cm -o dist/cssobj-core.min.js && gulp bump

author: James Yang <jamesyang999@gmail.com>
